updates.update_details: New release of the Intercom messenger Integration which delivers stability improvements.
New User Interface improvements in Smartflow editors to help better guide Admins on building smartflows and fixing errors with configurations
Our Smartflow migration tool has some new productivity enhancements to avoid clicks for Admins and improve "pre-loaded" flows when using the tool.
We are deploying a new Analytics dashboard for User Activity. This is currently in beta and will be deployed to customers Late September to early October.

It's our new version of the Segment integration built on the Aircall Integration Manager (AIM). The new version is has exactly the same features as the previous version, but built on our own technology platform.
We have implemented some updated designs in the phone app on the desktop
Additional features, such as mark conversation as unread, and messaging previews are being rolled out to customer's apps. Keep Aircall updated on your devices to see the latest features.

updates.update_title: Layout change for Users, Numbers and Teams
updates.update_details:
We are moving to a new list view for customers on Users, Numbers and Teams. This will become available to customers towards the end of the month and early September. 

 

The list view will show the related information, in a table rather than tiles.

updates.update_title: Layout change for Users, Numbers and Teams
updates.update_details:
We are moving to a new list view for customers on Users, Numbers and Teams. This will become available to customers towards the end of the month and early September. 

 

The list view will show the related information, in a table rather than tiles.

updates.update_title: Plan visibility in the Aircall Dashboard
updates.update_details: We have released a new feature on the Dashboard so that customers can see more information about their Aircall Plan. This will be released to all customers during the remainder of the month.

Improvements in logging calls and SMSs in Hubspot and improvements in Integration with Support Hub

Increase customisable features with the new integration
There are new Telecommunication compliance requirements for Spain phone numbers. As a result, the experience when purchasing these numbers has changed.
We will begin implementing and rolling out a new Conversation Center dashboard item to customers, which will enable better access to call recordings.

Added new features to start SMS from Call Detail views and call ended view. 

Added features to copy a number or text message and create a contact from a conversation. 

Overall, there are now more avenues to initiate a text message from the app and general improvements to User Experience flow.
New Unanswered calls dashboard pushed out to broader customer base.
Smartflow Migration tool being rolled out to customers.
Additional User Interface improvements including tips on using the tool

This new dashboard gives users the ability to track and minimise unanswered inbound calls, by highlighting when and why these calls are being missed. This feature is being rolled out to Analytics+ Customers.
New features which include leveraging the Standard call object, Assignment rules and Custom insight cards being released.
Technical improvements to the integration to improve underlying infrastructure
Zoho V1 Integration will be sunsetted by July the 5th. Customers need to update the integration to use Zoho V2.
In case of a network or 100% packet loss during an active call. Aircall will now attempt a reconnection for 15 seconds, with an informative message shown on the app.

Customers can now start a message from the new messaging section. This new functionality is available across Desktop and both mobile apps.

We’re creating a more intuitive and efficient experience for users who can now initiate text conversations through the new messaging section without having to navigate through multiple sections so they can easily manage their messaging communications.

Similar to Jabra and Yealink headphones, we now support Poly headset physically commands.

Users can use the physical buttons on their Poly headsets to easily:

Answer and hang up calls.
Unmute or mute
